title: Howard Stern-Riley Martin Special Pt1
description:
"20 years ago The Stern Show got a call from a guy who claimed to have been kidnapped by an alien race called the Biaviians who had a mothership near Saturn," Howard recalls of that day. "And we loved this guy so much that we gave him his own show when we came to Sirius because he was one of the best."

"The Riley Martin Show" aired on Howard 101 from 2006 until 2015 and featured discussion around Riley's personal experiences with extraterrestrial beings and things of this nature. From piss jugs to alien symbols, demands for more money, and even a call from jail, Riley seemed to always have something entertaining up his sleeve.

With great sadness, we said goodbye to Riley Martin this past December after a battle with health issues. While gone from this world, he will not soon be forgotten by fans.

In memory of Riley, catch your favorite on-air moments, prank calls, & even some brand new remixed stories.




20 Year History Of Riley Martin pt 1  (02:43:28)


* Riley Martin First Contact â€“ Howardâ€™s very first phone conversation with the Space Cowboy, Riley Martin. (7/24/96)

* Riley Martin Prison Saga â€“ Howard learns that Riley has been incarcerated; Riley calls from jail to try to get help.  He ends up spending time in prison for drug charges. (6/14/99, 6/16/99, 4/25/01)

* Tickets To The Mothership â€“ Riley is giving away tickets to the Mothership, warns of a blackout in Canada, and is making preparations for a 2012 exit from Earth. (2/12/02)
 
* Sirius Show Pitch â€“ Riley wants Howard to give him his own show on the new Sirius Satellite Radio. (7/28/05)

* Riley Upset With His Pay â€“ One of Rileyâ€™s first of many, many complaints about his small salary. (5/24/06)

* Pee Jug â€“ Howard discovers that Rileyâ€™s not using a toilet during his radio show. (4/25/07 & 5/3/07)

* Checks Are Late â€“ Riley is mad because his paychecks are late to arrive. (1/9/08)

* Riley vs. Brickleberry â€“ Riley thinks the cartoon â€œBrickleberryâ€ is ripping him off. (9/25/13 & 10/23/13)
